title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
steps: Mix the ingredients in a bowl.
Pour the batter into a hot pan.
Cook until golden brown.

title: Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix dry and wet ingredients separately.
Combine and fold in blueberries.
Bake in muffin cups for 20-25 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti al dente.
Cook bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs, parmesan, and pepper.
Toss cooked spaghetti in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Sauté chicken and garlic.
Cook pasta and make creamy sauce.
Combine and serve with parmesan cheese.

title: Classic Chocolate Cake
steps: Mix dry and wet ingredients.
Bake in greased pans.
Frost and enjoy.

title: Homemade Pizza
steps: Roll out dough, spread sauce, add toppings.
Bake in a hot oven until crust is golden.
Slice and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Toss lettuce with dressing and lemon juice.
Top with croutons and parmesan.
Drizzle with olive oil.

title: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook beef with taco seasoning.
Assemble tacos with toppings.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Mango Smoothie
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry vegetables and tofu in sesame oil.
Add ginger, garlic, and soy sauce.
Serve over cooked rice.

title: Mango Chicken Curry
steps: Sear chicken thighs in a pan until golden brown.
Add chopped onions and bell peppers.
Stir in coconut milk, diced mango, and curry powder.
Simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve over cooked basmati rice.

title: Mango Chicken Curry

title: Spicy Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic and chili flakes in olive oil.
Add shrimp and chopped tomatoes, cook until shrimp turns pink.
Toss cooked pasta with the shrimp mixture.
Garnish with parsley and serve.
